title: Activity-Based Mathematics Competency Development Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical computation skills and understanding of high school-level mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on collaborative activities with peer learners using smartphone-based VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can perform step-by-step mathematical modeling processes for real-life problem-solving with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can propose solutions to mathematical problems through collaboration with peers in VR simulations three or more times.
Learners can achieve a 20% or higher score improvement in pre-post self-efficacy surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
